instructions: Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 1 1 Download, install and open the Yelp for iPhone app from the Apple AppStore (if you haven't done so already). Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 2 2 Login to the Yelp for iPhone app, with your Yelp credentials, if you haven't done so already. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 3 3 Lock in a zip code that defines the area you'd be most-helpful with searching and answering questions from. The Talk page will change, depending on your zipcode. What you see in one zipcode may be different than those messages in a totally different zipcode a bunch of miles away. You'll find these settings on your Settings page in the Yelp for iPhone app. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 4 4 Navigate to the Talk option. Tap the More button on the white bar at the bottom of the screen. Tap the "Talk" option from the resulting drop-open list. This option should be near the top of the list (a few down from the top of the list). Advertisement

Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 5 1 Scroll through the list and see if any of the conversations appeal to you. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 6 2 Tap the conversation you'd like to read. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 7 3 Read through the conversation discussion page, to see if the conversation appeals to your liking. If not, tap the "Talk" arrow near the top left corner to bring you back to the menu of other choices of conversations to read. Advertisement

Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 8 1 Check to make sure a conversation like the one you are potentially going to mention, hasn't been asked or answered already from the location you're Yelping in (from your settings in the app). Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 9 2 Tap the "New" button at the top right corner of the screen. You'll be directed to a page asking you to input additional information. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 10 3 Tap and type a summary of what you'd like to explain later, into the "Conversation Topic" box. Make it catch the readers eye/attention. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 11 4 Categorize the new conversation. Tap the "Category" button underneath the "Category" label. If you've ever participated in the Yelp Talk page on your PC, you'll notice that these are the same exact categories as the ones you would see there too. Most topics can either be filed under "Local Questions & Answers", "Site Questions & Updates" or "Other". Sometimes, there's even been call for Yelpers to say "a long-time big hello" by using the "Yelper Shout-Outs" category. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 12 5 Tap and type the description of the new conversation into the Message box. Make sure the text that appears in this box, closely matches that of the summary you wrote in "Conversation Topic" above. There is no limit to how many characters can fit into this box, so there is no need to count. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 13 6 Post your conversation to Yelp. Tap the "Post" button at the top of the box, to post this conversation to your My Conversations area of the Talk area of the app. Saved conversations will be stored in the tab labeled "My Talk", and when a new reply has posted you'll receive a copy of the reply to the email box you typed when you signed up for an account (and the email account you are currently using to sign into the app). Advertisement

Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 14 1 Locate a conversation where you know of a reply that you can post. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 15 2 Read all the other replies to this conversation/discussion, or, if your reply would be the first (or you choose not to read the replies (which you really shouldn't do)), continue to the next step without doing so. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 16 3 Tap the "Jump to End" button from the top right corner of the screen. This should automatically bring up the last reply and the "Reply" box where you'll need to type your reply message. Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 17 4 Tap and type your reply message into the box labeled beneath the label "Reply". Image titled Use the Yelp User Talk Area on the Yelp for iPhone App Step 18 5 Tap the "Post" button when the message is completely written and spell- (and format-) checked for accuracy.
